title: Kayle Isn't Worth The 450 BE
body:
She is complete trash. Pre 11 is the most boring shit I have ever seen. You have a Q that does shit damage, a heal that heals less than an auto attack, and a ranged auto attack that literally does nothing. 

She can't top lane because bruisers will just push her out of lane, she can't mid because of snowballing assassins, she can't jg because she has shit clear speed and dies to almost every buff,  she can't support because her heal is less than a level 1 auto attack, and she can't ADC because every ADC is going to out range her and push her out of lane.

replies.body: Kayle is supposed to have a weak as shit early game, since she becomes a godly hyper carry late game. Perhaps Riot's cupping of Vayne's and Kai'Sa's balls has caused you to forget that this is how hyper carries are supposed to be.
The problem is she's a late game carry that doesn't have her hand held in a meta where most games are decided by 15 minutes and are over by half an hour.
